content: Hey, I think I recognize the guy in the purple t-shirt! In India it doesn’t matter if you are Hindu or Muslim, you get together and kill the other brothers. I think we are all wired to be that way in crowds. I don’t go to football games. I can feel it. Bad ju ju. I’m sorry this is what Austin is like now. It started when they plotted enough to tear down the Armadillo World Headquarters because they had to make a convention center there. They never made it…
